<image 1> explain global inequality and global stratification by focusing on the way that _______________.

A. Core nations and peripheral nations exploit semi-peripheral nations
B. Semi-peripheral nations exploit core nations
C. Peripheral nations exploit core nations
D. Core nations exploit peripheral nations

The image illustrates the dependency theory, which posits that core nations (represented by the eyes) exploit semi-peripheral nations (represented by the bull) and peripheral nations (represented by the face) to maintain their control over the periphery. This is depicted by the arrows pointing from the eyes to the bull and from the bull to the face, indicating the direction of dependency.

Therefore, the correct answer is:
A. Core nations and peripheral nations exploit semi-peripheral nations
